survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle owners regarding their experiences and satisfaction with public EV charging stations.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clear data collection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
